00101 my $apache_version = shift @ARGV;
00102 unless (defined $apache_version and $apache_version =~ /^apache[12]$/) {
00103     warn "invalid apache version specified -- assuming apache2\n";
00104     warn "usage: $0 { apache1 | apache2 }\n";
00105     sleep 1;
00106     $apache_version = "apache2";
00107 }
00108 
00109 if ($apache_version eq "apache1") {
00110     push @modulesList, @apache1ModulesList;
00111 } elsif ($apache_version eq "apache2") {
00112     push @modulesList, @apache2ModulesList;

00115 my @PATH = split(/:/, $ENV{PATH});
00116 check_apps(@applicationsList);
00117 
00118 check_modules(@modulesList);
00119 
00120 sub check_apps {
00121     my @applicationsList = @_;
00122     print "\nChecking your \$PATH for executables required by WeBWorK...\n";
00123 #   print "\$PATH=", shift @PATH, "\n";    # this throws away the first item -- usually /bin
00124         print "\$PATH=";
00125     print join ("\n", map("      $_", @PATH)), "\n\n";
00126     
00127     foreach my $app (@applicationsList)  {
00128         my $found = which($app);
00129         if ($found) {
00130             print "   $app found at $found\n";
00131         } else {
00132             print "** $app not found in \$PATH\n";
00133         }
00134     }
00135 }
00136 
00137 sub which {
00138     my $app = shift;
00139     foreach my $path (@PATH) {
00140         return "$path/$app" if -e "$path/$app";
00141     }
00142 }
00143 
00144 sub check_modules {
00145     my @modulesList = @_;
00146     
00147     print "\nChecking your \@INC for modules required by WeBWorK...\n";
00148     my @inc = @INC;
00149     print "\@INC=";
00150     print join ("\n", map("     $_", @inc)), "\n\n";
00151     
00152     foreach my $module (@modulesList)  {
00153         eval "use $module";
00154         if ($@) {
00155             my $file = $module;
00156             $file =~ s|::|/|g;
00157             $file .= ".pm";
00158             if ($@ =~ /Can't locate $file in \@INC/) {
00159                 print "** $module not found in \@INC\n";
00160             } else {
00161                 print "** $module found, but failed to load: $@";
00162             }
00163         } else {
00164             print "   $module found and loaded\n";
00165         }
00166     }
00167 }
